name: Secret Word Stack Riddle Cube: Wonder the hard time of injustice in this little adventure game
name_original: Secret Word Stack Riddle Cube: Wonder the hard time of injustice in this little adventure game
description:
“One of the most unique and innovative ways to tell a story I have seen in the App Store.”

“Finger clenching suspense with every turn of the page…a must download interactive story telling game.”

Check out the game that everyone is talking about. No longer do you have to take a passive approach to reading. With this game you are tasked with filling in blank words to help solve the mystery. What a great way to tell a story.

Earn coins after completing each chapter. Stuck? Use earned coins to reveal clues about each word.

This game makes for a real interactive experience.
